name: plebby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
belonging to a low social class, or typical of people who belong to a low social class: I can't bear her plebby friends. The Victorian middle classes wanted to show they understood it was plebby to cut your fish with a knife. See
pleb
More examplesFewer examplesI wouldn't like to live round here - it's a bit plebby.He thinks flat caps are ridiculously plebby.She views Aussies as rude, plebby little people.
